data.description: Dell Technologies Services Undergraduate Analytics Intern  Join us as an Undergraduate Analytics Intern on our Services team in our Hopkinton, MA office to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.Dell Technologies Services (DT Services) is an organization within Dell.  DT Services provides support and extended warranty services, managed deployment, enterprise installation, and configuration services for both Enterprise and Client customers. It is one of the most strategic and profitable organizations in the company and is currently experiencing extensive global growth.  DT Services is made up of global operations teams to include customer service, supply chain, and professional services, marketing and sales operations teams, finance, engineering, and more.    What you’ll achieve The business analytics intern will be working on a problem which would require detailed analytics to be resolved.  The intern will be responsible to carry out analytics and provide insights on how to resolve the problem. The project may also involve building KPIs and dashboards.  You will: Create analysis that uncover hidden opportunities to improve in areas such as operations, sales growth and dispatch effectiveness   Identify and interpret trends and patterns in datasets to predict outcome  Effectively communicate findings, insights and recommendations with business leaders   Partners with both internal & external sources to gather & examine data from disparate sources with the goal of discovering previously hidden insights.  Able to independently drive a task to completion, understand the data, end goals, and provide insights beyond the customer’s expectations.  Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements:  Currently enrolled UG in an accredited Bachelor’s program in Data Science, Statistics, or Business Analytics  Proficient data mining skills  Experience in Excel, SQL  & Power BI Excellent Communication Skills and ability to deal with ambiguity  Knowledge or experience using Statistica, SAS, R, SPSS, Hadoop, Teradata, Python, Tableau, Business Objects, C++  Desirable Requirements:Collaborate with peers and work independentlyAbility to adaptCompensation Dell is committed to fair and equitable compensation practices. The pay range for this position is $20.00 hourly – $37.15 hourly depending on location and grad level.  Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.  Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here.
responsibilities: Collaborate with peers and work independently
